00042 class OutStream
00043 {
00044         public:
00046                 OutStream();
00048                 virtual void write (const void *buffer, size_t len) = 0;
00050                 virtual size_t tell () = 0;
00052                 virtual void seek (size_t pos) = 0;
00054                 virtual ~OutStream();
00055 
00057                 template <class T>
00058                 void write (T t)
00059                 {
00060                         EndianUtils::flipEndian (&t, sizeof(T));
00061                         write (&t, sizeof(T));
00062                 }
00064                 void writeInt (int t)
00065                 {
00066                         write (t);
00067                 }
00069                 void writeDouble (double t)
00070                 {
00071                         write (t);
00072                 }
00073         protected:
00074         private:
00075 };
00076

00080         private:
00081                 std::ofstream mFile;
00082         public:
00084                 FileOutStream();
00087                 FileOutStream(const std::string &filename);
00090                 bool open (const std::string &filename);
00093                 bool isOpen ();
00095                 void close ();
00097                 template <class T>
00098                 void write (T t)
00099                 {
00100                         EndianUtils::flipEndian (&t, sizeof(T));
00101                         write (&t, sizeof(T));
00102                 }
00104                 virtual void write (const void *buffer, size_t len);
00106                 virtual size_t tell ();
00108                 virtual void seek (size_t pos);
00109 };

00113 {

00125                         return mBuffer;
00126                 }

00130                         return mSize;

00133                 template <class T>

00137                         write (&t, sizeof(T));
00138                 }
00140                 virtual ~MemoryOutStream ();
00142                 virtual void write (const void *buffer, size_t len);
